channel.title: Markdown on Hagun's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on Hagun's Blog

item.title: Testpage
item.description: Just a test page A long time since I’ve been looking for a solution for my blog. CMS is easy to use but it requires dedicated server and I didn’t want that. So static page, here I come. It’s a little steep learning curve for an electrical student, but the result is worth the effort. I just want to test some functions for my blog, so this post come first.
